CAREER SUMMARY
2012 to date: Present Company
Position: RBI / Integrity Consultant
RBI / Integrity Consultant member of the Asset Integrity Team.
Key project roles include:
Saudi Aramco RBI JAZAN Refinery Project / Fadhili RBI Project
Criticality assessment for JAZAN North and South Tank Farm facilities and Fadhili D42, D45,D47 and D44 Units pressure system using API RBI (E2G) Software
Corrosion Loops Identification on MSD and PFD
Inspection Plan and written scheme of examination using E2G software
Plant Integrity Windows
Inventory Groups Identification
Zadco RBI Project
Criticality assessment for Upper Zakum offshore facility pressure system using Build Me RBI software
Implementation of RBI approach for all ZADCO Offshore and Onshore facilities pressure system including static equipment, Piping, PSVs and Subsea pipeline
Development of RBI Methodology & Tool Configuration in accordance with Zadco Asset integrity management System
Identification of corrosion loops and degradation mechanisms for the Upper Zakum 750 and Satah full field project
Detailed RBI assessment for the static equipment and piping for all Zadco facilities
Pemex Mexico RBI Project
Identification and mark up of corrosion loops for the Magallanes field pressure system
Identification and Set-Up of Equipment Sub-Categories in the RBI build me software
Detailed RBI assessment for the static equipment and piping for Magallanes field
Written Scheme of Examination and Inspection Plans for Static Equipment
2011 – 2012 Saipem S.P.A Sharjah UAE
Position: Senior Risk Based Inspection Engineer
SATORP Refinery Project
Senior Risk Based Inspection Engineer with Saipem UAE Inspection team involved in the Jubail Refinery RBI project SATORP (Saudi Aramco Total Refinery and Petrochemical) to carry out the following actions:
Identification of the corrosion loops of the pressure system of the refinery based on the PID, PFD, MSD and all related technical data.
Identification of the degradation mechanisms based on the API 571 & 581.
Using the API RBI (E2G) and Meridium Software’s for the risk evaluation and criticality analysis of the pressure system of the Jubail Refinery.
Implementation of the inspection plan and written scheme of examination for the pressure system In the Refinery.
Dealing with client representative supervisor regarding the integrity problems of the project as well as the delivery of the different units of the refinery including the inspection requirements for all piping and pressure vessels of the Jubail Refinery.
Review Inspection requirements.
2005 – 2010 British Gas Tunisia
Position: Asset Integrity Engineer
Embedded into British Gas Tunisia integrity department as Asset Integrity/Inspection Engineer to assist in daily integrity related problems as well as projects. During this period, he was involved in the following:
Worked together with engineers from Lloyd register and Advantica to produce Risk based Inspection (RBI) written scheme for pressure system in BG Tunisia onshore and offshore using Capstone Methodologies
Ensure that all activities carried out during the inspection and testing, Installation and pre-commissioning of utility equipment, pipelines and shut down operations continue to meet the requirements of International Codes and Standards and are maintained safe and reliable to support the Asset Integrity at both Hannibal Gas Plant and Miskar Offshore Platform.
Preparation of the Hannibal painting programme for all equipment’s.
Directly involved in the Repair of the Amine Stripper Vessel at Hannibal Gas plant.
Preparation of the NDT flow line reports of MISKAR Offshore platform.
Preparation of work packs for the 2008 shut clown including vessels inspection plans, technical data, inspection reports, and permits to works.
Technical evaluation of the tender related to the provision of Pressure Systems, Pipeline Systems and Offshore Structure Examination & Specialist Inspection Services.
Inspection of pressure systems (pressure vessel, piping, heat exchanger, fired heater, etc…)
Performing pressure vessels in
